outputs.output_descr: This project is one of the two components of the larger UNDP Programme Component "Support to Decentralization and Local Development" which relates to the implementation by MAE and aims at Enhancing Decentralization and Local Development process in Mozambique.
outputs.output_title: Enhancing Dec and Loc Dev in M

outputs.output_descr: This project is one of the two components of the larger UNDP Programme Component "Support to Decentralization and Local Development" which related to the implementation by MPD. 2) supporting participatory decentralized planning and finance approach resulting in establishment in 2010 of a National Programme for Participatory Decentralized Planning and Finance (PNPFD) through MPD, the Ministry for Planning and Development. This specific component aims at supporting the Government of Mozambique (GoM) in consolidating the National programme for Participatory Decentralized Planning and Finance (PNPFD) established in 2010 after being successfully piloted for 10 years

project_title: Enhancing Dec and Loc Dev in Mozambique
